Is it an Assassin's Creed game, No… no it is not. If you care at all about the originals then you'll be unhappy with this one but as a seperate game on its own. It's a great time to have.

The story is good following your typical ancestral lineage eventually finding a time that'll help the assassins in the modern day. The best part about this game is that the modern day sequences are so small and short you won't remember by the end. As you follow the Greece setting of the world you're a mercenary choosing between two sides for better loot and gold as it is crucial to advance in the story. You're taking down a cult that could be the origin of the templar order before they formed under that name. You take out key figures that could be characters you already know and hate or love. But your ultimate goal is to save your brother or sister or kill them as the choice is up to you. 
The side quests are refreshing and decent, most of them are forgettable and others will stick by you facing the consequences of your actions. Having multiple ending and choices again is refreshing and gives the game life and flavour.

Gameplay is familiar to people who play dark souls, with the dodging and fighting bosses 10x stronger then you. I personally dont mind the smoothness and fast pace of the combat others may disagree. The stealth element is pretty dang as most of the time you can't kill tuffer or moderate enemies instantly without buffing your stealth tree and having bonus abilities to silent them. 
Saying that the skill tree is interesting enough makes combat exciting as you spartan kick and perform a flurry of attacks or crush them with a warhammer causing devastating damage to all nearby enemies. 

My main concern is the leveling, the game forces you to complete side quests and activities to proceed the main story quest. By that i mean each main quest makes sure the level requirement is higher than the last. Unlike the witcher 3 you can proceed with the main quest without grinding all side quests in the area just to finish one main quest just to do the same again.
This was mainly done with the microtransactions in the game as you can time skip, making you level up quicker practically one shotting everyone. I hope the next assassin's creed doesn't have it, but makes it balanced if those who just want to focus on the main story are then being forced to grind. 

The game isn't worth $90 AU when the next assassin's creed game is right around the corner so grab it on sale for a good RPG story driven experience that'll keep you entertained for over 70 or more hours depending on whether you get the DLC with it or not. 



Thank you for reading this far i hope you found this review informative, if you have any questions please ask away in the comment section or add me and send me a private DM 

Thank you all

73147044.review:
I've played Assassin's Creed: 2, Syndicate, and Origins. Odyssey is so far above them, it's unreal. Odyssey represents the best that the franchise has to offer with upgraded mechanics for a smooth, immersive, and intuitive experience. Personally, I find that the RPG aspects really add to the experience and the story without taking away from the gameplay. As a PC gamer, the controls in Odyssey are very intuitive and I'm not pressing 4 different buttons on my keyboard at once in order to get something done. 

The story is compelling and the characters are a joy to get to know. Not to mention the huge map filled with all kinds of side quests and secrets that are actually fun to complete because each quest is a fully developed story. 

One of my favorite aspects of this game is that you now have much more control on how you choose to approach a mission. You can focus your character build to be purely ranged shots with a bow, or be straight up warrior, or focus on maintaining stealth and upgrading your equipment to suit your gameplay style. The diversity of missions is exactly what I needed in this franchise and it's refreshing to see how many new ideas they had. 

Odyssey is a visually stunning and immersive experience with gameplay and mechanics that make it easy to play and easy to love. Ubisoft is heading in the right direction with the Assassin's Creed franchise.

72665526.review: This game is great and so much fun. The storyline is amazing and not something that is necessary to do. The variety of experiences you can have is unbelievable. If you are getting bored of the story, then you can go and start a huge conquest battle fighting with and against hundreds of men. If you are bored of that then change your skill tree and play as someone with new abilities to try out. If you are looking for a good singleplayer game with lots of variety , then it is always worth the buy.

72529802.review:
De los mejores RPG que he jugado en mi vida, para poder disfrutar de este juegazo es importante separarlo del resto de los AC ya que si bien hace referencias y lo conecta con la historia tiene una jugabilidad completamente distinta.

[b] LO MEJOR: [/b]
- Un mundo enorme que prácticamente son 10 mapas de GTA V.
- Mundo interactivo, no sólo es grande el mapa si no que podés escalar todo, meterte en casas y cuevas, nadar hasta lo más profundo del mar y pelear con tiburones para encontrar tesoros. Nada de edificios de cartón hechos para llenar el mapa como en otros juegos.
- La personalización es en mi opinión la mejor que vi hasta ahora, si bien no tiene creador de personaje la cantidad de armaduras y armas que hay son infinitas.
- La jugabilidad, las únicas críticas que leí sobre esto es solo por ser diferente a los otros AC donde el sigilo es más importante que el combate, pero teniendo en cuenta que este juego es en la Antigua Grecia no tendría sentido eso, así que el combate es justamente de lo mejor de todo el juego, totalmente frenético y energizante.

[b] LO PEOR: [/b]
- Al no ser un juego lineal supongo que se enfocaron más en crear el mundo que en la historia ya que esta deja bastante que desear.
- Las decisiones que uno toma durante el juego si bien por momento parecen un plus no están muy bien pulidas y al final quedan un tanto superficiales.

En mi opinión 9/10

73058466.review:
Február óta játszom vele, szinte csak ezzel. Közel 160 órám van benne. Az AC:2 és a Black Flag kivételével egy résszel sem játszottam, és hát leesett az állam itt ragadtam ebben a játékban. A grafikára egy panasz nem lehet olyan tájak vannak benne hogy csak lestem. Az is élmény ha csak sétálgatsz az erdőben vagy a tengerparton. A hangok nagyon ott vannak, mintha tavasz lenne madárcsicser, békabrekeg stb. Nagyon részletes a világ szinte mindenre figyeltek. A növény világ is változik az egyes területek között. Északon mérsékeltövi, a szigetvilág óceáni (pálmafák), még délebbre meg száraz (kaktuszok, sivatagi). A térkép hatalmas, az összes terület fellelhető helyszínét bejártam. Egy idő után azért unalmas volt az erőd, barlang, sírhely váltogatása tengeren meg az elsüllyedt kincsek után úszkálás. 
A történet nem volt eget rengető, a "family" szó rengetegszer több kontextusban elhangzik, a kultisták üldözése végül is rendben volt. Úgy érzem, ha maga a bejárható terület fele vagy negyed ekkora lett volna akkor arányban lenne a történet nagysága a térben való elhelyezéssel. Így a térképen elhelyezett (erőd barlang stb.) elemek sem lennének ismétlődőek. Voltak helyszínek ahova egy szál sem vitt el.
A játékba épített RPG elemekkel különös gondom nem volt, szerencsére nem volt agyonbonyolítva. Választható karakterek közül Alexios-al játszottam. A párbeszédekben annyi jutott még eszembe, hogy nyugodtan használhattak volna több "kamerabeállítást", így ezt változatosabbá tudták volna tenni. (de így is 
sokkal-sokkal jobb, mint pl.: az Oblivionban!)
A történet mai szála, mintha nem is létezne, kár is erőltetni, viszont egy jelenben játszódó AC igazán érdekes lenne ahol pont az Animus lenne háttérben, vagy a játék korábbi történeteiből szedett infokat használnák. 
Mindent egybe vetve nagyon élveztem ezt a 160 órát, csak ajánlni tudom!

73808265.review:
Assassin's Creed Odyssey is the WORST GAME I've had the misfortune of playing in my life! the only thing this game has going for it is graphics and it's gameplay BUT even after the initial hours of playing this eventually got boring and repetitive. This whole game is designed for one purpose to waste your time! Ubisoft clearly is more invested in making something that will last you hours than making a meaningful experience. This is even more than apparent with THAT GOD AWFUL excuse for an ending to the and I use the term loosely "story" the story here is beyond trash. A 12 year old with paper and a crayon can make a more engaging and meaningful story line. The script, the dialogue ALL OF IT IS TRASH! this is inexcusable from a triple A developer. They give dialogue choice a first in Assassin Creed games which is a nice addition but it doesn't matter because the dialogue is all meaningless and the choices which is supposed to have an impact on future events of the game well you don't care because the story and everything related is terrible. The only reason I pushed myself soo hard to finish this HOT PILE OF GARBAGE is soo I can say Assassin's Creed Odyssey didn't defeat me. The ending is soo abrupt that I literally didn't even know it ended the only reason I could tell the "story" was over was because this tutorial message popped telling me new game plus was unlocked as if I want to experience this garbage again. Before I finished this game I had some belief that maybe Ubisoft can be saved and they can turn a new leaf after this I have never been more convinced that Ubisoft has no care or desire to make meaningful narrative driven games. Thank God they haven't touched Splinter Cell yet because they will turn that franchise to ruin the same way they have done with Assassin's Creed, Ghost Recon, and Far Cry. We'll see about Far Cry maybe just maybe Ubisoft can redeem itself with Far Cry 6 but I have absolutely no faith this will be the case.
Angry rant over, if you read all this then God bless and DO NOT TOUCH Assassin's Creed Odyssey.

73749474.review:
还没推完主线，简要说一下
比前作更细致，海战完成度更高，战斗系统一般般，看不出什么亮点。世界可探索内容很多。

最最弱智的是佣兵系统。一旦你被挂上通缉等级，要杀你的佣兵就会往你的所在位置走。就算你没被敌人发现，那几个来杀你的佣兵也会在你的位置附近晃来晃去，恶心至极。蹲在草里面等他走，一蹲就是一个小时。
到了主线某些强制挂上通缉的章节，刺杀任务目标就显得相当麻烦，最后往往演变成和据点士兵/佣兵的混战。而且杀了一个佣兵往往下一个就赶到了，最后只能跑路。
这个恶心的佣兵通缉系统导致我无论是做据点还是杀神教都浪费了巨额的时间，就单凭这一点，我暂时给这个游戏差评。

72855524.review: Ok so to to start this review I just wanna say I'm a HUGE ac fan, which is why it's so hard for me to not recommend this game. It's just not ac anymore. Origins still felt like an Assassin's Creed game, even if just barely. This one doesn't. If it was just an ancient Greece adventure with some parkour it would be a decent RPG, but the fact it's part of the ac franchise actually just makes the game feel worse. The optimization is also terrible, which doesn't help, I have 40 GB of RAM, an RTX 2080 and an i7 7700, and the game is still laggy. But it's not all bad, the graphics are pretty good, and the soundtrack is solid. I'm not gonna comment on the story since I got nowhere close to the end, but I can tell it could be enjoyed by some. The gameplay is nothing special, and the combat isn't really fun. I hope they fix that in Valhalla. In terms of historical accuracy I'm no expert, but as far as I can tell it's good, as one can expect from the ac franchise. I also really respect Ubisoft for allowing the player to sleep with anyone regardless of gender, as a bi guy that was cool to see. So overall if you're familiar with the ac games, I wouldn't play this, if you aren't, go ahead, try it.

▪ Segundo juego de la trilogía - Origins, Odyssey, Valhalla - y como era de esperar, continuista con respecto a lo ya visto en Origins.

▪ Dos personajes a elección siendo la protagonista femenina más carismática y adecuada para la historia que se narra.

▪ Vuelven los combates "desafiantes" contra mercenarios, el sistema de búsqueda de objetivos repartidos por el mapa y aquellos elementos rpg que caracterizaban a la anterior entrega.

▪ Gran cantidad de armas y armaduras aunque la variedad no es proporcional a la cantidad, solo va cambiando el material con el que están construidas y así, por ejemplo, podemos tener "cinco" versiones de un mismo yelmo.  
 
▪ Un enorme y hermoso mapa para recorrer lleno de actividades que, en un principio, puede abrumar y con las horas resultar repetitivo y aburrido.
 
▪ Una larga historia con giros de trama y un nuevo sistema de decisiones donde algunas de ellas afectan el final, aunque la gran mayoría no ofrecen consecuencias a largo plazo y se limitan a concluir historias secundarias con finales dramáticos, fortuitos, trágicos, divertidos...

▪ Algunas de estas misiones secundarias resultan llamativas y nos ofrecen entretenidos diálogos y situaciones absurdas. 

▪ La fantasía se mezcla de forma ridícula con la realidad, excusa para enfrentarnos con criaturas mitológicas visualmente geniales.

▪ Lamentablemente son necesarios los dlcs para concluir y darle un cierre a la historia, tanto del presente como del pasado.


[i]Para beneficio, o no, de algunos es Ubisoft siendo Ubisoft, utilizando y repitiendo sistemas y mecánicas que suelen incluir en todos sus juegos, quizás abusando demasiado de la extensión y alargando Odyssey de forma "no orgánica". 

Afortunadamente, como en Origins, no hay errores más allá de los que siempre suelen estar en un mundo abierto.[/i] 

[b]Recomendado si disfrutaste el anterior o si es tu primer juego de la saga.[b]

71524477.review:
What do you get when you add the standard Ubisoft chores to one of the best open worlds ever created? Not a bad game, apparently. 
Most Ubisoft open world games are just a bunch of recycled ideas from a previous game put in a new skin and this one is no exception. It has the fetch quests, synchronization towers, checklists etc. that we've seen in many older titles. There is even a separate class of daily quests that are basic fetch quests with generic writing (these have a silver icon instead of a gold one). I don't know why these exist in the game but they don't affect the game when ignored. The actual sidequests (those that aren't automatically generated fetch quests) are often underwhelming with mediocre writing and uninteresting tasks. However, a few character quest lines such as those of Socrates are an exception. These are surprisingly well written and thought provoking. The main storyline has its highs and lows but is interesting and well written overall. There is a decent mercenary system and a morally questionable conquest battle system, where you have to weaken a nation by burning its supplies and participate in the war that ensues, all just to get gear.
The combat in the game is a mixed bag. I don't like the reliance on adrenaline in combat. Halfway through the game, you'll stop caring about attacking and just spam abilities off cooldown, especially since there's an ability that refills adrenaline. As for stealth, the AI is not that smart. Detection doesn't use sound and is only based on vision. Crouching in a bush makes you invisible to even people that are really close to you. I also don't like the fact that stealth attacks aren't instakills and a guard might survive a stab in the neck just because he was 2 levels ahead of you. The naval combat is great.
What really makes the game interesting is the open world. Ancient Greece is a great location for an open world game and Ubisoft has nailed it. Cities filled with beautiful Greek architecture reinforced by bright marble, mountains enveloped in fog at dusk, sunlit valleys and the tiny islands on the horizon shrouded by the endless sea all come together to make a beautiful world. Everytime I dock my ship on a new island I would find myself eager to run in and explore. I only wish that the game didn't actively discourage exploration as it does. Every point of interest is marked with a question-mark on the map which cannot be turned off. Moreover, when you reach such a place, instead of letting you explore, the UI gives you a list of things to do and you can use your eagle to mark things in these list. This guarantees that you don't missing anything by not exploring. Thankfully, these can be turned off along-with a handful of other HUD elements, that take away from the experience, such as the the mini quest information widget. The main quests objectives are spread out in the world and there is a level scaling system. This means that once you get past the initial stages of the game, you are free to choose where to go.
Assassin's Creed Odyssey is far from perfect, but it is still very much an enjoyable game.

69217745.review:
□□升中初三党来谈谈此作的感受吧，先讲讲我跟阿育结缘的故事，当时还在小学六年级，暑假期间被邀至表哥家学C++(当然三分钟热度的我最终放弃了)，休闲期间表哥给我玩了一下他XBOX里的ACU，当时我觉得亚诺那个蓝色兜帽帅炸了，我当即就对刺客信条这个系列充满了兴趣，从此也决定放弃腾讯旗下的游戏（除lol）和网页游戏。但配置烂成渣的电脑不允许我肝这些游戏。说巧也巧，这部烂掉渣的电脑终于在初一上学期报废了，再加上初一第一个学期的期末考的不错，有个年级前50，于是我爸便决定帮我换一台上万块的电脑。当时对AC这个系列完全不懂，也不知道除了steam原来还有uplay，origin等游戏平台，于是自己便百度咨询，整理出了刺客信条的时间线。
 □□我第一部刺客信条，也是我第一部正版单机——刺客信条2给了我极大的启蒙和思想的升华，我惊叹了，原来游戏还能做成这样，第三人称+开放世界，这是我从未有过的游戏体验，于是我便对刺客信条这个系列结下了不解之缘，每逢打折，我总会买上几部刺客信条，花上几十个小时来沉浸其中，这对我的历史学科的学习也有很大的帮助，游戏中近乎1：1的建筑还原和历史名人还有真实发生的历史事件让我比同班同学更加了解中世纪的历史文化。渐渐的，我按着流程通关了AC2——AC兄弟会——AC启示录——AC3——AC黑旗——AC大革命——AC枭雄——AC起源（1，叛变，自由呐喊都是云通关。我的家庭并不富裕，我这买游戏的钱都是过年存下来和平常上学的加餐费省下来的）当然这期间还有玩其他的3A,如古墓丽影三部曲爆蛋精英等，但它们带给我的视觉冲击和感触始终没有刺客信条大。我佩服他们始终如一的信条、坚定不移的决心、如火如茶的爱情，这也许就是刺客信条的魅力。
□□ 奥德赛出那会儿我就很激动，但是因为学生党的缘故，穷得响叮当，248块的标准版，408块的黄金版，对我来说实在是如陨石般沉重的难以接受。于是我就安守本分先玩其他游戏，终于等到阿育打5折了，我想都没想直接入了。137小时的游玩时长，比我任何一部单机游戏的游玩时长都要长上不少，就我个人观点，我认为这是最棒的一部刺客信条，宏大的希腊世界、多元的战斗要素、令人叹为观止的优美景色，这无疑是款佳作。当然给它冠以“刺客信条”这个称号的确有点扯淡，满地图的育碧特色（问号）和袖箭dlc强制生娃这波骚操作也令我目瞪口呆。但,那又怎样！既然重复搜刮据点让你疲倦，那就不管它啊，这完全不影响你的游戏体验。无聊的时候，步行在雅典卫城中或是亚该亚河畔，随手截图一张，岂不美哉。家庭线和神器线都做得不错，我随便乱选就搞了个大团圆结局了。亚特兰蒂斯这个dlc给了3张图，对截图党来说实在是件好消息。剧情啥的嘛，能看就看，看不懂就去b站看看别人up主归纳的剧情，我始终是以截图为主剧情为辅的策略来游玩，因此在整个过程中乐此不疲，不会有大家说的什么真空期疲倦啥的。想狂战士就狂战士，潜入就潜入，完全取决与你，既然想玩出刺客的感觉，那就潜入暗杀吧，什么？潜入太麻烦，去你的，换上暴击装叫上个副手直接进去营地一顿乱砍完事。
 □□ 我始终认为，刺客信条，看的是信条，并不是刺客，不是随便一个游戏角色带上兜帽就能赋予“刺客信条”这个称号了。
□□ 当其他人盲目的追求刺客的信条的时候，记住！万物皆虚。
□□ 当其他人受到教规和信条的束缚的时候，记住！万事皆允。
□□Nothing is true, everything is permitted.
□□ 壮大我AC哉！！！

70770953.review:
个人感受：
最惊艳的一款刺客信条作品，奥德赛给我带来的震撼甚至比当年的黑旗来的更直接，无论你是想当狂战士、刺客还是古希腊狙击手，奥德赛自由的build系统都能给你最完美的体验
优点：
1.开放世界，虽然开放世界已经是3A的标配，但奥德赛中高度还原的希腊、清新绝美的天堂空间、浓烟缭绕的冥界以及科技与魔法相结合的亚特兰蒂斯4个世界组合着实让人眼前一亮
2.画面绝佳，如果你想去古希腊体验人文环境，奥德赛的旅游模式会满足你的一切愿望，“美”就是奥德赛可以呈现给你的最佳概括
3.自由build，如题，虽然刺客信条系列被人戏称为狂战士信条，奥德赛更是将“战士”这个特长发挥到极致，但多样的build不会减弱奥德赛的游戏性，相反，多种套装和build的组合让原本红刀子进白刀子出的刺杀变得丰富多彩
4.大厂风范，育碧毕竟是业界大哥之一，游戏制作水平一等一的高，不管是动作的流畅还是画面渲染放到2020年仍然威风不减，并且本作中bug经过完善并不会太影响游戏体验，至少我在奥德塞里没怎么遇到过恶性bug
缺点：
1.原价贵，等打折，终极版很亏，建议黄金版，体验亚特兰蒂斯dlc绝对超值
2.重复度高，AC系列的通病——游戏中期重复度极高，我在游玩到40-50小时的时段里经常不知道要做什么，只是重复地刷钱和地图问号
3.小bug偶尔影响游玩，比如有时鹰眼扫描不到目标、完成任务npc无法对话以及最难受的——在某些npc面前动武会吓跑他们，并且他们跑的跟卡姐一样快，跑路追不上（希腊人均雇佣兵？？？）2333~

总结：
打折、免费周末值得一试，在英灵殿推出之前，奥德赛是所有玩家除前几代之外最不能错过的作品！

72092122.review:
[h1]Short Review :[/h1]
After playing this game more than 150+ hours, this game basically :

[b]( Assassin's Creed especially Black Flag ) + ( Borderlands 2 complete with its grind fest, weapon/item loot system, and skill tree ) + ( Slightly downgraded version of Witcher 3 ) + ( Enemies recruiting system like Metal Gear Solid V ) + ( Huge map with visually stunning graphic ) + ( Microtransaction in full-priced single player games ) + ( Somewhat overkill DRM protection like any other recent Ubisoft games )[/b]

Blend all of them together, and voila. Assassin's Creed Odyssey

This is not Assassin's Creed that I used to know. But it still fun game nonetheless.

[h1]Detailed Review :[/h1]

[b]Pros :[/b]
+ Huge open world to explore
+ Great graphics. Visually stunning. Beautifully crafted especially in historical location/area.
+ Fairly good storyline.
+ Good gameplay mechanic
+ Decent combat mechanic
+ Somewhat has a huge content to play

[b]Cons:[/b]
- Level gating main storyline. Grinding and doing some uninspiring side quest over and over again for the sake of progressing through the main story is not fun at all.
- Resources/Materials is scarce. Resources/Materials needed for enhance/upgrade weapon and armor, upgrade ship, etc.
- Microtransaction in full-priced single player game. They know that not everyone like grinding and hunting for scarce resources/materials. it looks like they design their game this way so they can slap XP boost, materials, etc. And they somewhat can get away with this type of abomination. if another company like EA, Bethesda, etc doing this in their full priced single player games, surely they will got huge backlash over it.
- Somewhat overkill DRM protection. No matter where you buy any recent ubisoft games. It will have at least 3+ DRM layer that consist of something like Denuvo + VMProtect + Uplay. I hope they are not adding something like Always Online DRM type on top of that 3+ layer of DRM in their future games.

I recommend this game, If you are agree with pros more than cons I stated above.
8/10

71726035.review:
Öncelikle, bana göre witcher 3'den(2015) sonra çıkmış en iyi 3 oyundan birinin incelemesini okuyorsunuz. sözlerime 'ee bu assassin oyunu değil ki, oyunda gizlilik yok yaa' diyen beyinsiz kardeşlerime cevap vermekle başlamak istiyorum. evet dostlar, bu bir assassin's creed oyunu. hem de en iyilerinden. hiçbir oyununda olmadığı kadar gizlilik ve aksiyon sunan oyundur odyysey.

 sanırım insanlar suikastçi olmanın ne demek olduğunu hiçbir zaman anlayamayacaklar. kafaya kapşon takıp assassin olunuyorsa herkes assassin! :D bir insanı hidden blade ile öldürmek ile mızrakla öldürmek arasında hiçbir fark yok. istersek rpg kullanalım, önemli olan suikasti gerçekleştirmek değil midir? şimdi de serinin yeni oyunu hakkında vikings'ten assassin mi olur demeye başladılar.. sözün özü arakdaşlar, bu oyun TAŞ GİBİ BİR AC OYUNU.

oyunda 3 adet build sistemi var; hunter, warrior ve assassin. gizli gitmeyi sevenler assassin ve hunter kasarak diğer hiçbir oyunda olmayan gizlilik zevkini tadabilir. level atladıkça yeni perkler kazanıyoruz ve istediğimiz yönde harcayabiliyoruz. ve gerçekten de hepsi yararlı özellikler, hiçbiri laf olsun diye konmamış. özellikle warrior yetenekleri savaş zevkinizi kat be kat artırıyor.

oyunda sadece savaşmak değil, at sürmek, ok atmak, mağara keşfetmek, masmavi denizlerinde yüzmek, müthiş müziklerini dinlemek.. her şey hiç olmadığı kadar zevkli.
oyun bize görsel bir şölen yaşatıyor desek yeridir. gerçekten etkileyici grafiklere sahip. etrafı izlemekten oyuna odaklanamadım. oturup dakikalarca doğayı, denizi seyre daldığım oldu. özellikle fate of atlantis dlcsi.. görsel orgazmın zirvesi olabilir :)

oyunun hikayesi bazı yerlerde kopuk olsa da dünyanın büyüklüğü sıkılmanıza bir an olsun izin vermiyor. ana görevler kesinlikle farklı ve güzel. keza bazı yan görevler de öyle. çoğu oyundaki ana görevlerden daha kaliteli yan görevlere sahip oyunumuz, bambaşka hikayeler çıkabiliyor.. ancak dünyanın bu kadar 'dev' olması bazı yan görevlerde tekrara itiyor. keşke görev çokluğuna değil de içeriğine abansalarmış.

diğer bir eksi yönü de gemi savaşları olacak. black flag'dekinden çok çok aşağıda, zaten geminizi belli bir seviyeye kadar geliştirdikten sonra yenilmez oluyorsunuz. o yüzden ben genelde seyahat etmek için kullandım. zorunlu olmadıkça düşman gemileriyle çatışmaya girmedim, çünkü bayıyor. yapay zekanın da pek iyi olduğu söylenemez.

tam bir rpg oyunu olmasa da, yaptığımız seçimler ve gerçekleştirdiğimiz eylemler gerçekten de oyunun gidişatını etkiliyor. umarım hepiniz en mutlu sonla bitirirsiniz zira oyunda çok fazla son mevcut :)

sokrates, perikles gibi adamlarla oturup demokrasi ve yönetim etiği üzerine münazaralar yaptığımız, yine sokrates ve oyun yazarlarıyla düşünce özgürlüğü üzerine konuştuğumuz kısımlar inanılmaz keyif verdi bana. çünkü gerçekten sokratesi yazıldığı gibi yansıtmaya çalışmışlar. üslup, içerik, her şeyin kokusunu alıyorsunuz tarihi karakterlere dair.  tabi sadece tarih değil, mitoloji olarak da müthiş bir iş çıkarmış ubisoft. yunan mitolojisi hikaye olarak bakıldığı zaman tarihin en keyifli hikayelerinden biridir ve bu oyunu anlayarak (ingilizcesi iyi olmayanlar mutlaka türkçe yamasıyla oynasın) oynadığınız zaman hem çok iyi bir oyun oynamış oluyorsunuz hem de bu hikayeyi önemli oranda yaşamış oluyorsunuz. bu durum, aldığınız zevki ikiye katlamıyor, belki 4'e 5'e katlıyor.

dövüş sistemi o kadar geniş ki, canınız kılıçtan sıkılmışsa gürz kullanın, gürzden sıkılırsanız hançer kullanın.o da mı sarmadı? mızrak kullanın. belli bir süre ateş saldırınızı güçlendirip "yok ben vazgeçtim diyerek cüzi bir maliyetle yetenek ağacınızı sıfırlayarak örneğin zehir saldırılarına ya da ok saldırılarına odaklanabiliyorsunuz. bu da sistem oyunun monoton olmasını engelliyor. ve dostlar, inanın bana bu oyunda dövüşmek kolay değil ve zevki de buradan geliyor sanıırm. diğer ac oyunlarındaki gibi, blocklayıp counter attack yapmak yok. düşmanlar her yerden saldırabiliyor bu yüzden iyi bir strateji benimsemelisiniz.

size 3 tavsiyem var ; 1- bir an önce bitirmek için oynamayın, mundar etmeyin oyunu. rahat rahat, uzun uzun, atmosferini sindire sindire oynayın. "hehe ne oldu, ben 30 saatte bitirdim" diyenler oyun oynamak nedir, oyundan nasıl zevk alınır bilmeyen kişiler. onlardan biri olmayın.
 2- karakter olarak kesinlikle kassandra ile oynamanız. alexios'a hiç bulaşmayın, kassandra gerçekten müthiş bir karakter :)
3- gold edition alın. fate of atlantis dlcsi, oyun tarihinde blood and wine'dan sonra gördüğüm en güzel dlc.

origins'ten 1 sene sonra çıksa da, yaklaşık 4 senede bitmiş bir oyun odyssey. yani origins çıktığında bile yapımına devam edilmekteydi. oyunu yapan ekip bizzat gidip yunanistan'ı karış karış gezerek, antik yunanistan'a yakın bir atmosfer yaratmayı başarmış. mesela girit adası sanki başlı başına başka bir oyun gibi ve adadaki hikayeler de antik yunan tarihine ait hikayeler. adamlar kafalarına göre minator hikayesi koymamışlar. benim gibi yunan mitolojisini bilen biriyseniz, bu detaylar sizin ağzınızı bir karış açık bırakıyor. daha oyunun başında, kefalonya'nın karşısındaki küçük adacığa gittiğinize anlıyorsunuz bunu, çünkü o ada gerçekte de odysseus'un evinin olduğuna inanılan ada, oyunda da..

sırf incelemenin uzunluğundan bile ne kadar dolu ve güzel bir oyun olduğunu anlayabilirsiniz odyysey'in. inanın bana, bahsedemediğim tonlarca şey daha var :D uzun lafın kısası, AC ODYYSEY hikayesi, dövüş sistemi, açık dünyası, atmosferi ve sunduğu özgürlükler ile herkesin oynaması gereken bir oyun. okuyan herkese teşekkür ederim, diğer incelemelerde görüşmek üzere..

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WzuqTxasOuE

9.4/10

70048812.review:
Absolutely delightful.

Tons of stories to experience. Thank to whoever decided to implement cringe and hillarious moments to some of those stories.

I would like to thank to developers for this great odyssey because meeting Hippocrates, Herodotos and Socrates was amazing. Characters in this game are seriously well written and its unique experience to interact with them.

Huge world to explore (around 16km square) plus DLC maps (3).
The way you progress in this world is well made. World level up with you (you can disable that if you like but i am against it)

Since its ancient greek there are stories about mythical creatures and gods. (Thats all i am gonna say)

While i can say, go and get this great game where you have easily over 100h of gameplay, there are some parts i personaly dont like.
For example
 - You slow down if you are close to fort, village and/or city. This is really annoying.
 - Horse pathfinding if actually slightly worse than in AC:Origin. Especially in cities.
 - Your character have trouble to climb some walls. Especially cliffs.
 - Skills could have couple different animations since combat is huge part of this gameplay and it gets little repetetive to see the same animation over and over again.
 - Final upgrades for ship are kinda too expensive. I have over 160hrs in this game and i wasn't able to fully upgrade my ship
 - DLC stories or in fact any other stories rarely reacts on your other stories you finished. For example if you dealt with main villain group and you start some other quest, they are not aware of this and your character doesnt have a clue either. This is slightly annoying.

Dont cry about big ass open sea area. I spend very small amount of time at sea because there is little to nothing to do except talking with Barnabas.

But its overall well managed. Story telling is AMAZING and your choices in some cases really matter.
Origin and Odyssey are must have for assassins creed fans. Yes the combat system is brand new and feels kinda weird from start but its must have for the story.

Honestly i didnt enjoy other game as this one for quite some time.

70458662.review:
[h1] THIS IS SPARTA [/h1]

Asassin's Creed Origins ile yükselişe geçen Ubisoft, oyunculardan aldığı olumlu tepkilerin ardından Asassin's Creed serisini açık dünya rpg oyunu olma yoluna doğru soktu. Asassin's Creed Odyssey ile birlikte dahada geriye Antik Yunanistana milattan önce 431 yılına taşınıyoruz. Ubisoft bu oyun farklı diyerek yaptığımız seçimlerin oyundaki kaderimizi değiştirebileceğini söylemişti.

Odyssey milattan önce 480'de meşhur 300 spartalı'nın komutanı Leonidas'ı kontrol ettiğimiz bir savaş ile başlıyor. Oyunumuz bize 2 karakter seçme imkanı sunuyor bunlar Kassandra ve Aleksios ikisinin tek farkı cinsiyetleri geri kalan hikaye herşeyi birebir aynı hiç bir fark bulunmuyor. Kısa girişin ardından ana karakterimiz'in hikayesini öğrenmeye başlıyoruz. Daha çocuk yaşta babamız tarafından savaşçı olarak yetiştirilmiş, ancak bir gece yaşanan bir olay sonrası ailemizden ayrı düşüp bir tekneyle memleketimizden ayrılıyoruz. Kefalonya adasında kıyıya vuran karakterimizi Markos adındaki bir tacir himayesine alır. Karakterimizi besleyip büyüten Markos'un başını beladan kurtarmak temalı oyundaki ilk görevimiz de böylece başlar.Daha sonra gizemli bir tüccar ile tanışan karakterimiz ödül avcılığına soyunacak Night of Spartan lakaplı, kendisi gibi spartalı olan bir generali öldürme görevi alır. Kefalonya adasından ayrılıp denize açılarak antik Yunanistan'ı ve köklerinin dayandığı gizemi keşfe çıkacaktır. ''Kozmoz Kültü'' adı verilen gizemli bir örgüt, tüm antik Yunanistan'a yayılmış, kötü emellerini gerçekleştirmek için, politikacıları, sanatçıları felsefecileri, devlet kademesindeki önemli kişileri öldürmek adına, dünyaynın dört bir yanına katiller salmıştır. Artık oyunda hem ailemizin gizemini çözmek hemde Kozmoz Kültü ile mücadele etmek için antik Yunanistan'ı baştan başa keşfetmeye başlicaktır.

Odyssey ile birlikte artık tam olarak suikastçı değiliz oyunda gerçek bir savaşcı ve gezgin şeklinde bir karakter oluyoruz. Antik Yunanistan okadar güzel yapılmışki keşfedilmeye bekleyen yüzlerce yer var hepsi birbirinden zorlayıcı ve güzel. Oyunun genel olarak seslendirmeleri olsun atmosferi olsun çok başarılı. Haritayı keşfetmek gerçekten çok keyifli.

Odyssey'de Origins'de olduğu gibi level sistemi var, bu level sistemi her level atlıyaşımızda bize 1 kabiliyet puanı veriyor bu puan ilede karakterimize yetenek edinebiliyoruz. Birbirinden farklı ağır saldırılar rakibin ataklarını savurmak kalkanını kırmak gibi çeşitli yetenekler bulunabiliyor. Origins ile başlıyan bu yetenek ağacı Oddysey ile bayağı bi gelişmiş durumda. Ubisoft bizlere ateş ve zehir dinamiği getirmiş bu dinamik kılıcımıza oklarımıza takıp düşmanlarımıza fazla hasar vermemize sebeb oluyor. Özellikle Kozmoz Kültü ile mücadelede bu dinamikleri kullanmamız bizi avantajlı duruma getiriyor fakat her karakterin direnci farklı ateş direnci olan bir karaktere ateş hasarı çok az veriyorsunuz.

Savaşlarda çok fazla asker öldürdüğünüzde dikkat çekmeye başlıyorsunuz ve başınıza ödül konuluyor ve haritada rasgele gezerken karşınıza ödül avcısı çıkıyor ve öldürdüğünüzde bir üst seviyeye çıkıyorsunuz. Ödül avcılığı levellerinde örnek vermek gerekirse demircide eşya alırken daha az para ödeme efendime söyliyim kılıcımıza özellik basarken daha az para alma gibi en başa geldiğimizde özel yanarlı dönerli bir at kazanıyoruz. Bunları yapmanın tek yolu karşımıza gelen paralı askerleri öldürmek.

Odyssey ile gelen yeni özellikler arasında bir şehirdeki askerleri ve o şehrin kralını öldürdüğünüzde Ülke gücü düşüyor ve belirli bir yere geldiğinde Fetih savaşı açılıyor. Bu savaşta Spart ve ya Atina tarafını seçiyoruz bir taraf saldırıyor bir taraf savunuyor ikisinden birini seçip savaşı kazanmasına yardımcı oluyoruz ve o bölge Atina'ya ait ise Sparta tarafına geçiyor keyifli bir savaş oluyor. Kazandığımızda bize epic eşya veriliyor. Oyunda ayrıca çok fazla zırh ve silah bulunuyor. Farklı farklı kombinasyonlar yapmak mümkün benim beğendiğim bir özellik oldu açıkcası. Antik Yunanistan'dayız ve elbette bir gemimiz ve bu gemimizi özelleştirebiliyoruz boyasını dekorasyonlarını falan içinde olan askerleri özelleştirebiliyoruz. Gemimizin hasar gücünü savunmasını gibi özellikleri geliştirebiliyoruz. Black Flagda'ın gemi mekaniklerini biraz daha arcade hale getirip bize sunmuşlar gemi kontrolü fena değil.

Oyunun görevlerine gelicek olursak hikayesi keyifli ben açıkcası sıkılmadın ve yan görev olarak inanılmaz derecede fazla görev var. Bu görevleri yaparken ayrıca antik Yunanistan'ı keşfediyoruz. Witcher 3'de ki kontrat alma sistemi Odyssey'de de mevcut panolardan görev alıp özel techizatlar kazanabiliyoruz. Odyssey ile birlikte artık hikayemizde seçimler yapabiliyoruz fakat bu seçimler bir Witcher gibi değil hatta yakınından bile geçmiyor. Yaptığımız seçimler açıkcası neredeyse hiç bir şeye yaramıyor çok ufak çaplı değişikler oluyor.

Sonuç olarak Asassin's Creed Odyssey bizlere dövüş mekaniğine gelen bir kaç yenilik ve çok da derin olmayan seçim yapma mekaniği ile karşımıza çıkıyor. Zaman zaman Origins ile pek farkı yok dememiz mümkün. Oyunda her ne kadar Komoz Kültü mensuplarının peşlerine düşsek de, seride Suikastçı temasından uzaklaştık diyebiliriz. Odyssey baktığımız zaman  tamamen gezgin kahraman oyunu olmuş. Antik Yunanistan'ı keşfet, gizemlerin peşine düş, yüzlerce görev yap, yeni silahlar zırhlar elde et askeri üsleri bas, savaşlara katıl, denizlere açıl falan filan olarak gidiyor. Kısacası Origins'i sevdiyseniz Odyssey çok daha iyi bir oyun olarak karşımıza çıkıyor ve daha uzun oynama süresi bulunduruyor. Kısacası oyun benim açımdan olmuş çok keyif aldım ve henüz hiç keşfetmediğim yerler bile var.

69852835.review:
Apesar de eu ter o jogo faz vários e vários meses, eu ainda não havia jogado todos os jogos da franquia, então achei justo ir jogando um a um, na ordem, para poder entender o contexto de Assassin's Creed Odyssey dentro da franquia, afinal os jogos isolados não fazem tanto sentido além da diversão. Bom, nesse ponto já devem ter percebido que não sou a pessoa mais entendida da franquia, o que eu sei é aquilo que a maioria que jogou apenas os jogos sabe.

Vou fazer aqui uma breve análise do que achei do Assassin's Creed Odyssey, o que pode servir de base para que novos jogadores tenham um bom proveito.

[h1]JOGABILIDADE[/h1]

Quem acompanha a franquia sabe que a jogabilidade dos jogos mudaram muito no decorrer do tempo, principalmente a partir do Origins. A Ubisoft decidiu mergulhar de vez no action-RPG em Assassin's Creed Odyssey, o que deu mais ou menos certo, agradou alguns e outros não.

Para que um action-RPG funcione bem ele não pode ficar repetitivo e nem enjoativo, coisa que o Assasin's Creed Odyssey tem de sobra, o jogo basicamente nos força a fazer grinding se quisermos progredir, o que acaba tirando nosso foco da campanha principal. Nesse ponto é que muita gente acaba falando que o jogo é ruim por não conseguir separar a jogabilidade repetitiva do enredo, que é bom.

A ideia de tomar os fortes, os acampamentos e as minas é extremamente divertida, mas chega num ponto que a repetitividade torna tudo tão maçante a ponto de se tornar chato, por isso eu me limitei a jogar no máximo de três a quatro horas por dia.

Eu sou uma pessoa que gosta de jogar furtivamente e em muitas ocasiões eu tive de enfrentar vários inimigos na pancadaria porque a personagem não dava conta de matar com hitkill, o que acabava com a furtividade, sem contar que a previsão da barra de vida dos inimigos é imprecisa, dependendo da build que a gente faz.

[b][i]"Ah, mas é só fazer uma build com um milhão de dano de assassino que é hitkill até no minotauro, seu noob."[/i][/b]

Da metade para o final do jogo de fato era hitkill na maioria dos inimigos, mas quem realmente gosta de furtividade quer mandar facada no pescoço desde o início do jogo. Tem muita gente, como eu, que leva a furtividade a sério.

O sistema de escolha dos diálogos no jogo é bem simples, nada tão avançado e de outro mundo, porém muitas escolhas nos fazem refletir sobre a nossa realidade. Certas escolhas não mudam nada no jogo, mas nos fazem pensar em possibilidades e o que poderia vir a acontecer se aquilo fosse real, mas claro que isso vai de pessoa para pessoa, nem todo mundo gosta de pensar, apenas jogar.

[h1]GRÁFICOS E FOTOGRAFIA[/h1]

Os gráficos são lindos e a arquitetura impecável, quanto a isso os Assassin's Creed nunca deixaram a desejar. Quando paramos para observar as estruturas gregas em seus detalhes, é de encher os olhos. A paisagem também foi muito bem trabalhada, com uma grande quantidade de biomas e cores, até mesmo no mar tem beleza e muitas atividades, o que muitas vezes acaba nos distraindo daquilo que estávamos fazendo.

A fotografia do jogo é maravilhosa, principalmente quando comparamos os biomas e os mundos, eles passam a sensação de que realmente estamos naquele lugar. O submundo passa uma sensação de agonia, enquanto Atlântida passa uma sensação de tranquilidade. Ainda que Atlântida não seja um lugar tão tranquilo.

[h1]ENREDO[/h1]

Por fim chegamos ao enredo, onde algumas pessoas criticam e outras elogiam, algo bem dividido já que é impossível agradar a todos. É complicado tentar fazer entrar na cabeça de alguns jogadores que uma história não se limita a uma só situação, mas também a seu passado. Contar a história dos seus avós também é contar a sua história, não é porque você não está nela que não é a sua história.

O jogo apresenta um enredo excelente, só que por conta de sua jogabilidade enjoativa algumas pessoas podem generalizar e colocar tudo num mesmo balaio, e falar que é tudo ruim, mas precisamos separar as coisas e analisar ponto a ponto.
As peças todas se encaixam, obviamente com muitos furos de roteiro, até porque quando um enredo lida com o tempo, na maioria das vezes tem furos, é quase impossível não ter. Flash, Vingadores, Power Rangers, Prince of Persia e Sonic estão aí para provar isso.

O grande problema que eu vejo aqui, é que para o enredo se encaixar de verdade é necessário jogar as expansões Destino de Atlântida e Legado da Primeira Lâmina, pelo menos para quem se importa com o presente, se a pessoa só se importa com os acontecimentos no Animus, o jogo base satisfaz.

Bom, eu nunca me incomodei com expansões que são uma história a parte independente do jogo base, compra quem quer, joga quem quer. Eu só não apoio expansões que complementam o enredo principal, como é o caso de Assassin's Creed Odyssey. A menos que o próximo jogo faça um resumo das expansões, é complicado forçar o jogador a comprar mais um pedaço do jogo para entender a história por completo, que querendo ou não ficaria incompleta sem essas partes.
Eu não vou me prolongar muito sobre o enredo porque isso só geraria brigas nos comentários, mas se prestar atenção em todo o jogo, nas missões, nas falas, verá que Assassin's Creed Odyssey está totalmente ligado com os demais jogos, do seu jeito, mas está. A história dentro do Animus é bem clichê, mas ser clichê não é sinônimo de ser ruim.

[h1]BUGS[/h1]

Eu não encontrei bugs que me atrapalhassem, algumas vezes o jogo não quis responder alguns comandos, mas nada que comprometesse a minha jogatina.

Eu joguei como Kassandra e algumas vezes a legenda colocava meu personagem no masculino como se eu fosse o Alexios e até mesmo personagens me chamaram de Alexios, porém nada disso estragou minha experiência, eu achei engraçado e segui em frente.

[h1]CONCLUSÃO[/h1]

Não vou me prolongar muito porque eu sei que poucas pessoas irão ler o texto todo, por mim eu detalharia muito mais minhas impressões, tenho muita coisa para falar sobre.

O jogo é excelente, mas pode se tornar enjoativo devido ao grinding forçado e excessivo, tanto que isso pode até mesmo tirar o foco da trama principal.

Após o Assassin's Creed III, o presente havia perdido aquela importância que tinha quando era com o Desmond, mas aos poucos ele vem tendo sua importância recuperada de volta. Tudo bem, ainda está longe de ser o que era, mas ainda é melhor do que ser esquecido. Layla é uma excelente personagem.

Para algumas pessoas, Odyssey pode "não ser" Assassin's Creed, porém o jogo tem extrema importância dentro da franquia, até porque muitos elementos o conectam com os anteriores.

É um jogo que com certeza vale a pena ser apreciado, mas sempre prestando atenção na história, documentos e falas. Não é o melhor da franquia, mas é maravilhoso e eu recomendo com certeza.

71920104.review:
There are negative's to this game, it has been on the market for a couple years so i do not feel the need to list them out here.  However to my mind the good far outweighs the bad.  The combat is simple while not seeming too simple.  The world is vast and rewards exploration.  

There are multiple ways to play in terms of weapons, skill and gear selections.  If you have time to explore the world and delve deep into the world this is as rewarding as Witcher 3.  If you prefer to simply go from main quest to main quest locations then this game will not be as great.

The protagonists you can select are well voice acted with Kassandra being excellently well done.

If you like RPG's, if you like Greek Mythology, then you should love this game.

69720839.review:
2020年5月21日我怀着激动难耐的心情通关了<<Assassin's Creed® Odyssey >>，本作是我刺客信条系列第二个通关作品（第一作是起源）！不管是在游玩前，游玩时还是在游玩后我都有很多话想说。
1.奥德赛发售于起源之后，在当时有一些人说奥德赛是起源的“换皮作品”。奥德赛是由育碧魁北克等工作室开发，起源是由育碧蒙特利尔工作室开发，两者是由不同的工作室同时开发，并且都做了3年。这两作是拥有相当数量的相同点，但是你只要认真玩过便会体会到二者的不同。刺客信条奥德赛绝对不是刺客信条起源的换皮作品！
2.本作的战斗系统相较于起源来说更能体现RPG化，虽然两作的战斗系统相同点很高，但是仔细区分还是会有不少不同点。起源中的“肾上腺激素”更像是自身的“大招”（姑且称之为一次性技能）；奥德赛上是将”肾上腺激素“分为若干个小格子，每使用掉一格便会释放一个技能（使战斗中技能的释放更具多样化，RPG味道更浓厚）。起源上是拥有”盾反“的，而奥德赛上将其替换为”招架“（不过这两个我都不经常用）。在武器方面上两作最大的区别（服装外貌等区别暂且不谈）应该是：起源上弓箭的种类很多（有较为好用的轻型弓）奥德赛上只有一种类型的弓（虽然也可以通过技能达到其它种类弓箭的能力，但是对我来说多少还是有点不方便），另一方面便是起源上武器应该是不能铭刻的，而奥德赛上除了武器自带的属性外，玩家可以前往铁匠铺进行铭刻（根据自己需要来选择属性）。
3.攀爬系统：两作在攀爬上可以说完全一样（目所能及之处几乎皆能爬），只不过起源上攀爬键位是（ALT),奥德赛上是（SHIFT)。我个人觉得后者更适合我（在起源上因为攀爬键的原因，经常在游戏中呼出输入法（WIN 10))。*可能也是因为这样的动作系统，使得我在战斗中（市区中，一般有许多障碍物）经常发生“误操作”，很是尴尬，希望可以在续作中改进（*后皆为个人看法及体验,并不能代表大众）。
4.佣兵系统：（皆为个人看法，不能代表大众）首先，很新颖，屏幕右下角的佣兵脑袋图案与GTA中的“犯罪星”有异曲同工之妙！佣兵这一敌人在游戏前中期是很强力的，不过有些佣兵身上携带有强力的传奇装备，玩家可以好好利用一下。除此之外便都是对玩家的恶意，在一次主线任务中要是碰到3个及其以上数量的佣兵感觉就不用玩了。。。（人家不仅数量多，而且等级还高，呈等差数列往上增）。虽然也能将佣兵“遣回”（通过给钱，大量的钱）不过大多数情况下都是不划算的。（顺带一提我一般不会去主动找佣兵将其打败，各位还未接触过本作的玩家可以去试一下提前找到并打败佣兵这一方法，看看是否会使任务变简单）
5.等级系统：本作“等级同步”这使得你无论如何提升等级，你的敌人等级与你相同。想体验等级压制在本作中几乎不存在。伴随着等级的提升，敌人的能力也会增强（不单单只是数值方面的增长）。打到后期敌方人均会“霸体”，像那些Smash,连击，破防，“扔瓶子”也是司空见惯罢了。（关于本作的等级系统，仁者见仁智者见智，在此不做过多评价）
6.征服战:征服战算是本作的一个亮点，当一个国家的国力被削减到一定程度后便可对其发动征服战。征服战的代入感还是挺不错的，好评！
7.海战：本作的海战很出彩！玩家可以对自己的舰船进行升级主要分为“舰船自身等级”和各种提升海战武器伤害的杂七杂八的等级。通过提升舰船自身的等级可以解锁更多的”副手“招募槽位(副手类似于一种BUFF，上限为4个）。关于副手的招募方法，玩家可以通过潜行”掐晕“对方来招募（这一点要给个好评）。本作的海战比起源上丰富很多。
8：奥德赛流程比较长，如果你是第一次接触起源或者是奥德赛，那么我推荐你去游玩起源（因为奥德赛的流程实在是长，特别是到中期，剧情平平无奇还很拖沓（这里并没有贬低奥德赛的意思，请谅解））。
最后：这一趟古希腊之旅真是令人回味无穷！！！
总之<<Assassin's Creed® Odyssey >>是一款绝对值得一玩的佳作！！！期待续作！！！

70658110.review: The game is fairly enjoyable, but Ubisoft's monitization scheme is unforgivable. They intentionally make the game give you less money and less xp than you need to progress smoothly, then try to sell money and xp boosts for real money as "time savers." It's despicable. While the problem can be avoided by modding the game, just don't give Ubisoft your money. Also, the story seems promising at first, but doesn't deliver in the long term. Near the end, it doesn't escalate much in terms of story and gameplay, so it feels like it ends suddenly and inconclusively. The game also gives you the feeling that your choices don't matter, usually by making your attempts to avoid killing people resulting in you having to kill them anyways. It feels like the writers want to force one outcome, regardless of your choices. The problems in the story aren't apparent until after playing for tens of hours, so don't waste your time.

71617639.review:
首先，从结论上来说是推荐的。不管怎么说，育碧他旅游一直做得很好，哪怕是400块钱买了一张不限时的古希腊旅游券也是不亏的。景色确实不错。
然后说游戏性，剧情方面10分的话差不多6分吧。感觉不如前作《起源》，虽然多了很多选择的余地，不过剧情的不严密以及一些演出的问题，感觉对剧情的表述上反而拖了后腿。（配音方面也差强人意吧，感觉日配和英配都一般）
可以很明显的看出在玩法上更照顾玩家了，摔落伤害都可以通过加点取消掉，不少战士和刺客的技能都是为了狂战士准备的，而刺客的快速刺杀技能实在是方便过头了。神话生物战可以说是亮点，不过也不到满分水平吧。
游戏本体最突出的问题就是开放世界太模板化了，地图又比前作大那么多，中后期开始跑图就给人一种厌倦和痛苦的感觉了，对于要全地点的朋友们来说实在不友好。
DLC《第一把袖箭的传承》很不推荐，感觉剧情开始乱跳了，刺客传承的味儿也不如前作的《无形者》DLC。
DLC《亚特兰蒂斯》得分三部分讲，第一部分简直是喂屎，仿佛给了玩家选择帮谁的决定权，但收束点只有一个，完全没考虑玩家根据他的剧情站到了其他队的情况，这一章的角色刻画稀烂，我给0分。第二章的冥界做的很有表现力，也导入了一点点新机制增加了游戏难度，不过给人的感觉还是很不爽，大约4分吧。第三章的亚特兰蒂斯倒是给人改观不少，不管是跑图还是人物都让人感觉舒坦了一些，尤其是和前两章对比就更显得难能可贵了，大约8分左右吧。
总体来说就是游戏的美术做的很好，音乐也不错，UI也很好，不过剧情和游戏性上拉胯了些，人物方面看在苏格拉底的面子上就不做批判了。推荐在打折降价的时候买

71113049.review:
育碧游戏骂归骂，该买照买。
市面一流ARPG，单看玩家交互和优化之类的各种细节都拉其他小厂新厂几条街。
剧情有该有的起伏和共情点，主线+DLC全通了也很有代入感。
旅游模拟也是名不虚传，风景极佳，也算高度还原。
战斗系统很开放很自由也很全面。
无论是起源还是奥德赛都是铁打的刺客信条，刺不死不会去升级？

70277998.review:
Lo mejor:
+Kassandra ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
+La ambientación (Antigua Grecia).
+Muchas piezas de equipo y armas distintas.
+La personalización visual te permite tener el aspecto que quieras sin importar qué armaduras lleves equipadas.
+Poder mejorar el barco.
+Muchísimas misiones disponibles.
+Las distintas habilidades de combate.
+Es el primer juego de la saga con elecciones de conversación durante los diálogos.

Lo peor:
-La exploración se les fue un poco de las manos (se siente más pesada que en Origins).
-La historia empieza muy bien, pero después de descubrir el culto de Kosmos se empieza a volver aburrida cuanto más avanzas. Al final, ninguno de los 2 posibles endings es realmente satisfactorio (el ending de Origins dejó el listón demasiado alto) y la cosa tampoco mejora mucho precisamente con los 2 DLC's que expanden la historia.
-El líder del culto de Kosmos es súmamente decepcionante.
-Las escenas sexuales están censuradas y no hay desnudos como en Origins (lo cual es increíblemente contradictorio con la Grecia clásica).
-Una vez más, las partes ambientadas en la actualidad, de lo peor del juego.

NOTA: 8,5 (Muy Bueno)

71225878.review: Simply a magnificent game. This game is a must have for anyone who has a mild or great interest in the ancient world. The environment and graphics are astoundingly beautiful. I thoroughly enjoyed the combat mechanics and skill customisation. Excluding the minor non-unique quests that litter the map, almost each side quest feels fresh and has an interesting story behind it. This game is probably one of the most expensive games to buy with all DLC unless on sale, but if you can get it for 50% off or more it is worth every penny. Easily one of the best RPG games out there right now.

71745897.review: Hikayeyi hiç umursamadan o zamanların iç açıcı Yunanistan manzarasını seyrederek baştan sona bitirdim. Oyunun ana hikayesi aman aman olmasa da ek paketleri oynarken gazlanmadım değil. İki ek paket de farklı konular üzerine yoğunlaşıp benim ilgimi çeken hikayeler anlattı. Yunan mitolojisi ile aram iyi olduğundan o destansı canavarları keserken de epey zevk aldım. Oyun 1 kere tamamen bitirilip tekrar başlanmaması gereken bir oyun. Bir kere oyunu iliğine kadar sömürüp ardından bu defteri kapatın ve aklınızda oyunla alakalı güzel anılar ile geminizle birlikte başka bir yolculuk için yelken açın.

69768041.review:
Я, как человек настырный, сносила игру уже пару раз и устанавливала снова, чтобы заставить себя ее пройти до конца. Обо всем по-порядку. 
Плюсы. 
1. Красяво
Минусы
1. Игра скучная, искусственно затянутая. Вместо того, чтобы идти по главквесту, игрока заставляют проходить унылые побочки, чтобы набрать на необходимый уровень. В итоге, когда нарубишь толпу наемников, культистов, предводителей, уже вообще фиолетово на сюжет.
2. Диалоги. Куцые и неинтересные. Сначала я честно слушала все подряд, потом просто стала пропускать диалоги, ибо ничего нового и интересного там не выловишь. 
3. Квесты. Отравили какого-то чувака, сбегай за противоядием и/или убей пару волков или разбойников. Такого плана 99% квестов в этой игре. При этом почти наверняка персонажа отправят в очередную "крепость", где надо найти "сокровище" N-штук и спалить пару ящиков с припасами. Под сокровищем подразумевается пара драхм и очередные железные трусы.
4. Ужасная озвучка. Увы, я не знаю, что там в английской версии, но в русской локализации вечно пыхтящая Кассандра  и Алексиос  откровенно бесят. Даже если они ходит пешком, они вечно пыхтят. А уж если "повезло" прокатиться на корабле, то готовьтесь к тому, что их не заткнуть, они каждые полсекунды орут "навались!", их просто хочется прибить.
5. Вездесущие наемники, которые появляются в не зависимости от деяний ГГ и бегут колупать вас с истошным ревом. ИИ тут выше всех похвал. Если начинается бой с очередной Евлампией Пятиж*пой, все местные гончары и огородники несутся со всех ног помогать либо ГГ, либо наемнику. Причем каждый раз это лотерея. А медведи и волки ждут только ГГ, не смотря на то, что в двух шагах пасутся жирные олени.
6. Большой открытый мир тут скорее минус, чем плюс. Причины - выше. Да, мир большой, и вроде бы даже не пустой, везде понатыканы деревни с кучей грустных квестов вроде "я потерял тапок в 2000000 км отсюда, принеси", но это тупо место для гринда, и не более, ведь надо качнуть кораблик и шмот ГГ, иначе любого бомжа будете колупать по полчаса. Ну или микротранзакции, которые помогут качнуть себя побыстрее, если вы понимаете о чем я.
7. Недороманчики. Зачем было пихать это убожество - непонятно. Принес тапок бомжу и он твой навеки. 
8. Бесполезный Икар. В предыдущих частях орлиное зрение было полезной приблудой, с помощью которой можно было найти в толпе или на определенной территории нужного чувака, или предмет. Тут есть квестовый маркер, который учтиво тащит игрока в нужное место и к нужному персонажу. Зачем нужно еще тратить время на Икара - загадка.
9. Цена игры и ее дополнений без скидки.
Итог. Игра безусловно красивая, клепать скриншоты можно на каждом шагу. Но и только.  Больше в игре нечем заняться. Квесты скучные, ГГ деревянный/деревянная, интересных неписей нет, знаменитые и прославленные имена чисто для галочки, сюжет затянут и печален. Таскаться по карте на 1000000 км, чтобы поговорить с очередным пиксельным буратинкой - скучно. Покупать стоит разве что под очень большую скидку, что я и сделала.

69712961.review:
Одним словом – помойка. Являюсь фанатом серии АС, однако, вышло все как обычно.(СПОЙЛЕРЫ)
Минусы:
- Гринд. Его слишком много, на каждой локе раскиданы одни и те же активности (пещеры, убийство животных, форты и тд) До Афин, я зачищал фулл карту, денег и лвла хватало, в Афинах уже чувствовалась нехватка как опыта, так и ресурсов. Взял буст опыта и голды, играть стало в разы комфортнее, однако без него придется зачищать все локации, а их там не мало, а активности одинаковые.
- Точки синхронизации. На маленьком острове 3-4, на больших участках земли 1. Особенно чувствуется нехватка в длс про Дария, и ряде других регионов.
- Древо умений. Половина скилов абсолютна бесполезна, в связи с ограничением в выборе (4шт) из за этого ты не можешь их брать, так как в приоритете скилы из веток воин и убийца. Ветка охотника, не нужна, оставили бы пару скилов и все. Учитывая, что враги очень быстро сокращают дистанцию, делать упор на лук, такое себе удовольствие.
- Оптимизация. Значение этого слова юби забыли
- Оружие. На хай лвле для прокачки фулл сета нужно слишком много ресурсов. Либо иди покупай в магазине, либо иди зачищай все.
- Сюжет. Серия особо не славилась сильным сюжетом, но тут все грустно. Ваш выбор влияет только на некоторые ключевые кв, в основном, что бы ты не выбрал все сводится, убей или поговори и получи инфу. За 70ч игры, я абсолютно не проникся к персонажу. В некоторых моментах ты абсолютно не веришь в происходящее, встреча с матерью гг, выглядит не естественно, не вызывает эмоций и все сводится к тому, о привет, давно не виделись, гоу челиков на пляже валить? И таких моментов много. + растягивание сюжета, 1 основной кв делится на 3 допника, в которых убей, подай, принеси.
- Боевая система. Скучна и уныла, найдя нужные себе скилы, каждый бой происходит по единому сценарию. Также как и бои на кораблях, урезали все фишки вооружения, в итоге интереса плавать на корабле нет. 
- Слишком огромный мир. Можно было его урезать в 2 раза, и игра бы ничего не потеряла.
- Паркур. То персонаж карабкается по отвесной скале, то не может ухватиться за элемент здания. Порой в воде не можешь ухватиться за скалу.
- Лощадь. Зовешь лошадь, она бежит к гг и ты к ней на встречу, она берет и зачем то крутится вокруг своей оси, и ты не можешь сесть. Либо при призыве бежит от тебя, если ты идешь ей на встречу.
- Косметика. Почему нельзя было сделать просто шкурки скинов как в прошлых частях, нет надо было разбить скины на шмот, чтобы его качать, если ты хочешь ходить в этом скине. Поэтому если хотите скин, берите на 50+ лвле.
- Длс Атлантида. Лвл дизайн, просто отравительный. Кто придумал огромные скалы, города, на которые тяжело попасть, только разгонишься обрыв с водой, либо иди к единственному мосту, тп, либо ныряй и карабкайся 10мин на самый верх к точке. Но выглядят локации красиво, спору нет. Однако гринда также много как и в основной игре.
Плюсы:
- Графика. Юби всегда умели делать красивые города.
- Длс про Дария. Юби наконец то вспомнили, что эта игра про АС.

71429906.review:
噢MYLACA!!!依隻遊戲堅係史詩級。原本係為左學下希臘史同殺時間所以買黎玩下，冇乜野值得我失望。係DLC個度悶到我冇玩哂全部內容，基礎內容係冇得挑剔。當然係對我而言啦，如果你覺得反思人生係一件無聊事，歷史「關我L事」既話，咁依隻遊戲真係會悶死你。因為你會好執著個戰鬥系統，甚至對暗殺系統有過高期望，最終就會比個唔夠豐富既戰鬥系統悶死左。

遊戲裡面有好多對話都係對人生既反問，NPC既答案有時候真係出乎意料咁深刻，證明製作團隊並非等閒之輩(?)。而對話選項亦會因為夠深思熟慮而得到好結果，依點真係會令自己有幾大滿足感下，一瞬間產生左共嗚咁XD
不過我都奶過野，比如有一次因為意志唔堅定搞到「販夫」比人當眾處決，後期會因為依件事而出現不可挽回既局面，即係局部既bad end。
阿，仲有佢既人生質問通常圍繞住幾個大問題，令成個故事好有條理。有啲可惜既係，你信唔信神對個結果都冇影響（我冇好仔細咁check過)

講起黎依個故事既秩序神教真係勁似某個成日撩事鬥非既國家咁。由建立初衷到結束既心態，恐怕都能夠應用到一大批人身上，以及佢剩係識係咁用恐懼黎支配人民既手段，真係如出一轍。我有時候會將某啲現代元素（如經濟力量）代入「得摩斯」（巨大且無法控制既力量）依個角色黎去做思想實驗，總會有另一番感悟。正因力量龐大所以容易獲利，正因力量龐大而容易暴走，正因佢暴走都仲可以獲利，甚至時常獲得更多利益，所以大家都會暫時吞聲。久而久之......

69288535.review:
[table]
    [tr]
        [th][h1]Assassin’s Creed: Одиссея[/h1][/th]
   [/tr]
[/table]

Рекомендация игры: 
[b][i]ПОЛОЖИТЕЛЬНАЯ[/i][/b] / [strike]НЕЙТРАЛЬНАЯ[/strike] / [strike]ОТРИЦАТЕЛЬНАЯ[/strike]


[h1] [b] [i]Вступление[/i] [/b] [/h1]
[quote=ℊዙטȿᎿ ∂aჩᶄȵeȿȿ]
Отпусти прошлое и живи настоящим, ибо прошлое уже не вернуть. 
Здесь нет ассасинов, но есть наемники - те же самые убийцы, которые проливают кровь для достижений личных целей.
Здесь нет скрытого клинка, но есть копье, которое всегда при тебе.
Кредо? Оно тебе не к чему - верши свою судьбу и поступай так как подсказывает твое сердце.

Так зачем держаться за прошлое, если существует такое настоящее? Право выбрать свой путь и есть твое кредо!
[/quote]

[h1] [b] [i]Об игре / Личное мнение[/i] [/b] [/h1]
На этот раз события игры разворачиваются в Древней Греции в 431 году до н.э., где нам предлагают примерить одну из двух ролей наемников, потомков царя Леонида, по имени Алексиос и Кассандра, которые являются братом и сестрой.

После чего, нас ждет довольно долгое и увлекательное путешествие, которое запомнится надолго, т.к. эта часть серии вышла очень объемной в плане полного (100%) прохождения.
В Одиссеи открытый мир намного больше, чем в AC: Origins и по своему красив в любое время суток, а также разнообразен.

[u][b] [i]Каков твой путь?[/i] [/b][/u]
Большим отличием Одиссеи от всей серии является то, что здесь присутствует интерактивная система диалогов.
В зависимости от выбора и принятых вами решений, ход истории будет полностью меняться, что в свою очередь повлияет на финал игры.

Грубо говоря, если смешать AC: Black Flag, Origins и The Witcher 3, то получается что-то типо Одиссеи.

И да, в игре появилась возможность ловеласа, не знаю как за Алексиоса, но играя за Касандру можно переспать с персонажами любого пола. Но не стоит рассчитывать, что сцены будут выглядеть как из вселенной Ведьмака. Разработчики скорее всего побоялись этого делать, поэтому вы увидите легкие поцелуйчики, которые, порой, могут показаться воздушными. А ведь это атмосфера и в этом плане она, к сожалению, испорчена.

[h1][b][i]Геймплей[/i][/b][/h1]
Как и в Origins, после прохождения сюжетного задания перед нами открывается огромный открытый мир (без каких-либо загрузок), где мы вправе следовать куда пожелаем.
Исследовать этот красивый мир мы можем как пешком, верхом, а также на собственном корабле и лодках. Окунуться в глубины моря тоже возможно и конечно же забраться абсолютно на любую возвышенность.

Кстати, если прыгнуть с любой высоты, то мы не получим никакого урона. Такое впервые в серии, но выглядит очень эпично.


[u][b][i]ДОП. ЗАДАНИЯ[/i][/b][/u]
В Одиссеи огромное количество доп. квестов (просто море), которые многие из них имеют отдельный сюжет и состоят из нескольких заданий. К примеру, 1 квест / на 5-6 заданий.
Также в игре можно выполнять различные контракты с доски объявления, которые постоянно обновляются.
Как и в Origins, помимо квестов, мы можем исследовать разные области, но здесь их до жути много.
С одной стороны, это хорошо, т.к. есть еще чем заняться, но поверьте, со временем это становится утомительным занятием.

[u][b][i]КОРАБЛЬ[/i][/b][/u]
Вспомни Black Flag! Теперь у нас снова есть собственный корабль, который можно улучшать при помощи различных ресурсов и нанимать, почти, любого персонажа к себе в команду, а также менять внешний вид корабля.
Морские сражения выглядят эпично - разнеси врага в щепки, либо возьми его на абордаж. Выбор за тобой.
И да, корабль можно использовать в любое время.


[u][b][i]ЭКИПИРОВКА / СНАРЯЖЕНИЕ[/i][/b][/u]
В нужном разделе мы можем в любой момент игры настроить собственный стиль экипировки (шлемы, наручи, нагрудники, ботинки и т.п.) и выбрать на свой вкус оружие как дальнего так и ближнего боя.
Если соскучались по зловещим капюшонам, то они здесь тоже есть.

[u][b][i]Огромный ассортимент различного оружия такие как:[/i][/b][/u]
[list]
[*]Мечи
[*]Кинжалы
[*]Топоры
[*]Булавы
[*]Посохи
[*]Копья
[*]Луки
[/list]
Иными словами, разнообразие экипировки и снаряжения в этой части серии просто зашкаливает, и это не может не радовать.

[u][b][i]УЛУЧШЕНИЯ СНАРЯЖЕНИЯ[/i][/b][/u]
Как и в Origins, при помощи различных ресурсов можно улучшать свое снаряжение.
В ресурсы входит не только железо, ткани и т.п., но и шкуры различных животных, которые мы можем приобрести у торговцев, либо добыть своими силами, охотясь на животных.

[u][b][i]СПОСОБНОСТИ[/i][/b][/u]
Способности в этой части серии очень впечатляют и действительно играют важную роль в прохождении. Без них игра выглядела бы скучной в плане боевки. Каждое умение можно улучшить до 3 уровня.

[u][b][i]Способности делятся на 3 категории:[/i][/b][/u]

Охотник - относится к дальнему бою
Воин - к ближнему бою
Убийца - стелс прохождение

[u][b][i]МИФИЧЕСКИЕ СУЩЕСТВА[/i][/b][/u]
Еще один интересный момент. На своем нелегком пути, предстоит столкнуться с такими существами как:
[list]
[*]Циклоп
[*]Сфинкс
[*]Минотавр
[*]Медуза
[*]Арг
[*]Стероп
[/list]
Бои с мифическими боссами заслуживают отдельного внимания, такой подход безумно потрясен и придает игре таинственную атмосферу, что также очень впечатляет.


[u][b] [i]ЧТО НОВОГО? /ВКРАТЦЕ[/i] [/b][/u]
[list]
[*]Большой прекрасный и живой мир

[*]Выбор героя

[*]Нелинейный сюжет 

[*]Эпичные способности (умения)

[*]Полностью переработана боевая система

[*]Красивые добивающие приемы

[*]Появилась возможность настроить экипировку под свой стиль.

[*]Огромный ассортимент различных доспехов и оружия

[*]Заведи роман и займись любовью

[*]Снова у штурвала! Исследуй просторы океана на собственном корабле в любое время. 

[*]Взгляни страху в глаза! Столкнись лицом к лицу с мифическими существами

[*]Свободная камера претерпела изменения в лучшую сторону

[*]Наемникам нужны драхмы! Совершив преступление на нас начнут охоту

[*]Интересный момент, который я не припоминаю в серии. Если воинов убивать на глазах мирных жителей, то миролюбивые этого вам не простят и начнут тоже сражаться против вас

[*]В отличии от Origins, здесь уровень врагов повышается вместе с нашим

[*]Огромное количество различных второстепенных заданий, которые не хуже основного сюжета и также имеют нелинейность сюжета

[*]Появилась возможность участвовать в масштабных сражениях за любую из сторон - Спарта или Афины
[/list]
... и многое другое.

Это только малая часть моментов, которые я вспомнил. Вообще в игре еще много чего интересного.

[h1] [b] [i]Атмосфера и муз/звук сопровождение[/i] [/b] [/h1]
С этим у разработчиков нет проблем. Каждая серия игры имеет свою захватывающую атмосферу, которая пропитана той или иной историей с эпическим музыкальным сопровождением

Об этой части серии можно еще много чего сказать, но лучше все увидеть своими глазами.

71097002.review: Auch wenn es im vergleich zu Assassins Creed Origins nur andere Assets und Story ist, ist es wieder ein sehr gut gelungenes Spiel, sowohl von der Grafik als auch von der Story.

72329174.review:
I finally finished AC Odyssey and all its DLCs, so it's time to write a [b] (spoiler-free!) [/b] review.
I'd heard mixed things about this game, so I was reluctant to play it at first. Lucky for me, I got a taste during its free weekend a few months ago and immediately got hooked. I got the Ultimate Edition on sale. 230 hours later, here's all you need to know about Odyssey. In order: Story and Quests, World and Graphics, Gameplay and Combat, DLCs and what edition you should get.

[h1] Story and Quests [/h1]

Odyssey is set in Ancient Greece during the Peloponnesian War, a conflict between the city-states of Sparta and Athens. You play as an ex-Spartan, exiled from their home due to breaking the national law as a child. Separated from your family, you grow up on the island of Kephallonia and are raised to be a [i] misthios [/i] or mercenary. You eventually leave to explore the rest of the Greek world and search for your family, uncovering a great conspiracy. You can choose between a male or female character, but this choice will not affect your opportunities or the way you are treated in the game.

The campaign will give you roughly 80 hours of content. I personally found Odyssey's storyline to be really interesting - it didn't have the annoying anger and vengeance of earlier AC titles and I think it is really well-paced. You meet and befriend a variety of characters including famous historical figures like Socrates, Pericles, Aristophanes, Euripides, Lysander and so on. Something I quite liked is that these characters have lines which are actual, real-life quotes, and any ancient history nerd like me will be ecstatic over this. I admit that I predicted many of the major plot-twists so they aren't exactly revolutionary, but this didn't take away from my experience. What I was really surprised about is that your choices actually really affect the story - it's not at all linear! I found that this really added to immersion, and the game also has its fair share of moral dilemmas.

Odyssey is absolutely full of side quests and bounties. Many of them are entertaining and there is a good range from short to long side missions. Unfortunately, Ubisoft remains as per usual pretty formulaic and many missions are fetch quests or based only on killing someone/something. Despite this, it's still pretty easy to find enjoyment in completing them.

[h1] World and Graphics [/h1]

The graphics in Odyssey are completely mesmerising. You could honestly buy the game just to explore and take screenshots and it would probably be worth it. The game has a great photo mode, too. As far as I know, you don't need incredibly high specs for it to look very pretty either; I played on mostly medium settings and was very impressed.

Content-wise, the world has an overwhelming amount of locations to complete, each with its own set of objectives. Anyone who completes the game 100% deserves to be called a demigod. The world is massive, with tons of regions to explore. There's a variety of location types, ranging from military camps to caves and forts. Generally, there's always something to do.

When it comes to historical accuracy, I was actually pretty impressed. I think Ubisoft really did make an effort to research the time period and the game is full of cool details. For example, the sea shanties are all original Greek poems from 2+ millennia ago. There are also historical locations with extra info, but this is only accessible on the map and I actually wasn't aware of this function until halfway through the game because it's not emphasised at all. The main point of inaccuracy I can point out is that there is a bit too much equality for the time period (which was very, very sexist and racist)... but hey, it's historical [i] fiction [/i] for a reason.

[h1] Gameplay and Combat [/h1]

The main thing to say here is that [i] Odyssey isn't really an Assassin's Creed game. [/i] There are a variety of difficulty levels to choose from, but there is far less emphasis on stealth than in previous titles. A big criticism from many is that the one-shot assassination kill mechanic is NOT in the game, and that is honestly kind of annoying. You can still choose to play stealthily, of course, but Odyssey is not a stealth-based game. Instead of the Eagle Vision sixth sense, you have an eagle that you can take control of to scout locations.

[b] However, [/b] Odyssey is a brilliant historical RPG in every other sense. There are 3 skill trees which you can upgrade as you level up, which all have cool and useful abilities to diversify and customise your gameplay. The melee combat is really fun and you can choose between a variety of weapon types like daggers, spears and staffs alongside a bow. All weapons and armour have different perks and come in different levels of rarity. This gives you the freedom to choose your playstyle.

There are also other cool combat mechanics. You get to command your own ship (which you can upgrade throughout the game) and engage in naval combat. There are other mercenaries who can be hired to kill you when you commit illegal actions; this mechanic is comparable to Shadow of Mordor's nemesis system. There are bosses from a variety of Greek myths and legends, including legendary animals. There are also conquest battles where you can join the fight between Athenian and Spartan forces, though participation unfortunately has no real effect on the development of the war plot or how your character is treated by NPCs.

As a side note, your ship, weapons and armour are all visually customizable. Though this isn't major, I think it adds to the aesthetics of the game and is nice to have.

[h1] Secrets of Greece DLC [/h1]

This DLC is included in the season pass. Unfortunately, there isn't much to say about it. It basically adds a few more normal side quests, which are all fairly standard.

[h1] Legacy of the First Blade DLC [/h1]

This DLC is split up into 3 chapters which are all included in the season pass or can be bought separately. I quite liked this DLC - it has an interesting story and builds on existing mechanics. It gives you a lot to do in regions that are otherwise lacking in quest content. It also adds [spoiler] Persian [/spoiler] enemies, including a ton of new bosses and cool new enemy types with new designs. The DLC also adds 3 new abilities alongside a new ship function, all of which I personally thought were quite useful and fun.

The Legacy of the First Blade DLC is great for AC lore fans as it explores the origins of the Templar/Assassin divide. It has some memorable characters and is overall quite enjoyable, but I wouldn't say it blew me away.

[h1] Fate of Atlantis DLC [/h1]

This DLC is also split into 3 chapters which are included in the season pass or can be bought separately. I have to say, I LOVED this DLC. It has a brilliant story with absolute tons to do, exploring new AC lore and adding a fantasy element to the game. It adds 3 new worlds to explore, which are all full of unique locations and have distinct designs and charm. I was really impressed with each of the worlds. The DLC also adds HEAPS of gameplay extensions, allowing you to unlock ability "enhancements" (optional modifications for skills) that can really change how you play and it gives you lots of easily gained ability points. There are really interesting new enemy types and a lot of new gear. The DLC is mythology-centered and you get to meet interesting figures like Adonis and fight heroes like Herakles and Achilles.

The Fate of Atlantis is an expansion I'd recommend to all players. It adds tons of new content and is really impressive.

[h1] Conclusion [/h1]

Rating: 8/10

I recommend the Gold Edition. Deluxe/Ultimate just come with a bit of extra customisation items and boosters. I really liked this game, but know what you're buying: it's a fantastic historical RPG, but not what you'd expect from an AC stealth-based game. It can be repetitive but it has a gorgeous world with hours of content.

72195776.review:
Задушила в итоге меня эта игра, но я не могу назвать её плохой.
Все минусы юбисофт все и так знают, н для кого не секрет, что геймплейно игра слабовата, и сюжетно.
Но красоты Греции великолепна и графон в целом.
Пришлось заспидранить ее до конца как можно скорее.

71372633.review:
Im Grunde ist Odyssey dasselbe Spiel wie AC Origins.

Es gibt drei wesentlich Unterschiede zu Origins.
1) Man spielt im alten Griechenland (klar)
2) Der Kult des Kosmos
3) Das eigene Kriegsschiff für den Seekampf

Der Kult des Kosmos ist als riesige übergeordnete Quest ins Spiel integriert. Man muss immer wieder Anführer finden und eliminieren, teilweise in Storyquests, teilweise ohne Verbindung zur Story. Diese Aufgabe ist sehr umfangreich und begleitet einem das ganze Spiel.

Der Seekampf mit dem eigenen Kriegsschiff ist eher langweilig und rein für weiteres Grinding geschaffen worden. Man kann unendliche viele Ressourcen sammeln und in sein Schiff stecken, so daß damit wieder viel Spielzeit generiert wird. Das hätte man sich aber auch sparen können.

Insgesamt ist AC Odyssee ein sehr gutes Spiel, daß aber nicht ganz so gut optimiert wie AC Origins ist. Man findet immer wieder auch kleine Bugs, wie fehlende Wegpunkte, schwebende NPCs, usw. - und die grafische Darstellung der Gesichter ist schon sehr "unecht" und gleichförmig. Außerdem bleibt man beim Laufen und Klettern in der Open World immer wieder mal an kleinen Kanten hängen und muss einen anderen Weg wählen.

Da wurde AC Origins deutlich besser optimiert. Ist aber auch klar - Origins erschien mit 2 Jahren Abstand zum Vorgänger, AC Odyssey nur mit 1 Jahr Abstand. Da blieb einfach keine Zeit für weitere Optimierungen. Trotzdem kann man AC Odyssey größtenteils bugfrei spielen und die Darstellung des alten Griechenland ist der Hammer.

Also, beide Daumen hoch !

70424400.review:
Me he topado con mucha gente resentida con este juego, que esto ya no tiene nada que ver con assassin's creed, que ya se fueron por completo por las ramas e incluso a algún ingenioso que se le ocurrió decir que "es un simulador de caminar". En mi opinión no es algo tan dramático, el juego tiene muchos puntos fuertes, aunque también creo que es cierto que es el "menos assassin's creed de todos", principalmente porque no existe una orden de los asesinos como tal, pero bueno, el juego está ambientado en una época previa a la creación de la orden, así que es de esperar. Además, en el juego por más que en la época situada dentro del animus no haya una organización tal como los asesinos no es argumento suficiente para dictaminar que es un juego totalmente distinto, siendo que de todas formas sigue la linea temporal actual, con un personaje principal ya presentado en su antecesor, assassin's creed origins.
Además, como fanático de la mitología griega y la Grecia clásica, disfruté tanto el juego base como el dlc "El destino de la Atlántida", en el primer caso porque se puede ver de primera mano como era la vida en esa época politeísta, e incluso se puede ahondar mas en ella con el modo turista que ofrece el juego, en el cual se puede recorrer toda Grecia y conocer en más detalle como era su civilización.
Pero bueno, yendo hacia el estilo de juego, si es cierto que tiene un modo mas informal de actuar en las misiones que todos los assassin's creed anteriores, y con esto me refiero a que no es que haya que ir de un punto a a un punto b y hacer x cosa, sino que hay que buscar en el mapa y recorrerlo para encontrar lo que se está buscando, lo cual le da cierto realismo (aunque para los que prefieren la otra forma, también está incluída en el juego para no andar buscando). En cuanto al combate es mucho más fluido y realista, vengo de jugar la saga de Ezio y de los Kenway y se nota que en el estilo de lucha dejaron atrás eso robotizado que tenía (por dar un ejemplo, en Assassin's Creed Revelations puedes ir tranquilamente al mercado de la Capadocia y matar absolutamente a todos los templarios simplemente contraatacandoles, lo he hecho muchas veces). Las ramas de habilidades dan otro toque al juego bastante bueno, permitiendo poder adaptar a Kassandra o Alexios de tu propio estilo de juego, con las habilidades que te sean más cómodas y dandote cierta ventaja contra determinados enemigos.
Tambien otra cosa que me encantó y que extrañaba de Assassin's Creed II es que añadieron un culto al cual darle caza uno por uno (que en la versión de Ezio se le daba caza enteramente en la historia, y más que un culto era solo una organización templaria, pero bueno), y que a su vez añade un giro inesperado al final.
En conclusión, a mi me encantó el juego y lo recomiendo 100%, aporta una historia bastante buena y duradera, mucha cultura griega y un estilo de lucha variable y realista, posiblemente lo juegue varias veces.

71088146.review:
Лучшая игра серии (для меня, конечно)! Это одна из немногих игр, в которую я наиграл более 100 часов с удовольствием, и это не просто так:
- хороший сюжет, вот правда ощущалось сопереживание главному герою, я играл за Кассандру поэтому стоить добавить прекрасную русскоязычную озвучку героини, весь этот неумело наигранный пафос, бравада, ирония, искренность, угроза, жалость и прочее - классно переданы озвучкой, главная героиня получилась "живой" и это радует.
- красивый, большой мир, есть уникальные противники, исторические места, шикарные пейзажи, статуи, храмы  и многое другое что хочется исследовать, причем это сделано гладко, плавно, без разрывов.
- хорошая боевая система с возможностью перераспределения очков навыков, что может в корне изменить стиль игры в любое время, я проходил игру на контроллере от xbox one и остался под впечатлением от того насколько великолепно подогнано управление! Истоки я проходил на клавиатуре, и управление показалось невнятным, много было мискликов и однообразных боев, в Одиссее боевка мало того приятна, она еще и кинематографична. 

Подытожив, скажу, что предыдущие Ассасины были хороши в свое время, но планка постоянно падала, и вот уже играя в Синдикат (около 50 часов потратил на неспешное полное прохождение), я просто мечтал чтобы все это закончилось, хотя  Лондон мне понравился, Иви и ее стиль игры тоже были интересны, даже тупой Джейкоб придавал изюминку игре, но как-то глобально это было плоским и однообразным. Истоки задали новую планку развития серии, без которой серия скатилась бы в убогую ежегодную дрочильню и тут у всех бомбануло, что мол лорность утеряна, таких ограниченных мнений я не понимаю и не разделяю. Естественно Истоки не смогли быть идеальными, т.к. сильно много фундаментальных изменений было произведено и Юбики так и не смогли побороть свою тягу к тупому гринду с первой попытки, но вот Одиссея для меня идеальна: механики отшлифованы, гринд оставлен только тем кому он нужен (я специально ничего не собирал намеренно и все же все прокачано до легендарного уровня), яркие персонажи, история, присутствующий некий выбор (у меня все живы и хэппи энд), все это прям радует! Я однозначно рекомендую игру к прохождению, последний раз я был так впечатлен после прохождения Ведьмака 3, поэтому и эта игра станет на полку любимых игр. Всем добра)

71110438.review:
[b] Assassin's Creed® Odyssey [/b] é o jogo mais recente da franquia (até o momento da análise) e é, corretamente, considerado o melhor título dela, juntando incríveis gráficos, uma jogabilidade muito bem estruturada e bem feita e uma história, além de bem contada, bem produzida e roteirizada. 
O jogo segue com o modelo do seu antecessor (Assassin's Creed® Origins), mas, dessa vez, ele se passa na Grécia antiga e tenta explicar o começo da "Bloodline" e de sua rivalidade com os famosos "Templars", mostrando diversas figuras icônicas da história da Grécia, como Hipócrates, Sócrates, Aristófanes, Heródoto, entre outros.
Além disso, o jogo valoriza muito suas escolhas, tendo que uma escolha pode definir o início de uma briga, uma amizade e até mesmo mudar o final do jogo, isso faz com que você entre mais no personagem e crie maiores conexões com os demais NPCs.
Essa mecânica de escolhas e outras mecânicas, como a de combate furtivo e ativo, determinam muito o modo de como você vai levar o jogo; você pode decidir ser um assassino frenético que mata todos que ver pela frente, pode ser um cara bondoso que só mata quem precisa morrer, pode ser um silencioso assassino e também ser um barulhento, entre diversos outros modos de jogo que você pode utilizar. Eu acredito que isso é muito interessante, pois faz o jogo se adaptar ao estilo de cada um.
Fora todas essas coisas tradicionais da maioria dos jogos da franquia, esse título manda muito bem nos gêneros que ele representa, como RPG, o sistema de missões, de experiência e de armas é bem feito, como um mundo aberto, ele possui mecânicas, como a melhora nos níveis dos inimigos do jogo inteiro conforme o seu avanço, que fazem o jogo nunca ficar muito fácil mas, obviamente, possui algumas restrições, como áreas que possuem um nível base mais alto, o que faz você não poder ficar vagando pelo mundo inteiro livremente, resumindo, ele é um bom mundo aberto e, por fim, como um jogo de ação e assassino, suas batalhas e lutas são muito bem auxiliadas com mecânicas de habilidades e de combos que fazem as lutas serem dinâmicas e divertidas.
As viagens pelo jogo são feitas, em sua maioria, por cavalo ou navio, mas se você não quiser ficar apreciando as paisagens e perdendo muito tempo, o jogo tem a mecânica de viagem rápida, que pode ser feita a partir de pontos que você sincroniza no mapa e vão poupar muito tempo do jogador.
E para terminar, o jogo oferece boas batalhas de chefões com padrões de ataques variados e únicos que geram boas batalhas emocionantes e muitas vezes complexas, vale mencionar, que o design de cada um dos inimigos é extremamente detalhado e bonito.
Apesar de eu não ter sido o maior fã da franquia antes de jogar o jogo, a história, os personagens, os gráficos e as mecânicas do jogo me prenderam e me deixaram ansioso para jogar os futuros jogos da franquia, por isso sou obrigado a caracterizar Assassin's Creed® Odyssey como um Must Play.

[b] Nota: [/b]
Nota de Assassin's Creed® Odyssey: 10/10
